title: Machine Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Collaborative Learning-Based MBA Practical Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary-level grasp of organizational management and fundamental business theories
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform team-based decision-making processes with over 80% participation by utilizing concrescent conversation techniques in a simulation environment.
Learners can propose solutions to real-world business problems at least three times by applying collaborative learning strategies in VR-based scenarios.
Learners can diagnose their self-directed learning styles (Sensing-Intuitive) through formative assessments and derive at least two strategies for applying them to team projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
